title: Bali’s Best-Kept Secret - The Soori
description: Experience one of the leading hotels of the world, Soori Bali. Hidden within the untouched paradise of Bali's last wild frontier, this is Bali as it should be. Holiday like a star with five nights in a huge 290-sqm Mountain Pool Villa with a private infinity pool and enjoy daily breakfasts, return airport transfers, multiple dinners created by a world-class chef including a ‘Flavours of Indonesia’ dinner, three-course fine dining experience and a romantic candlelit seafood dinner on the beach, plus a 60-minute spa treatment each, Segway tour and Tanah Lot Temple sunset tour for only $2,999 for two, valued up to $5,675.
offer_address: Soori Bali Banjar Dukuh, Desa Kelating, Kerambitan, Tabanan - Bali 82161, Indonesia 82161
